name: Rhygar e os Soldados do Rei
summary:
Rhygar is a farmer who lives with his father on their ranch. One day, he need to sell their cow, only to watch his father being murdered by monsters on the way back home. Now, begins his journey to become a Kight of the King in order to get revenge on the monsters who killed his father.

Rhygar e os Soldados do Rei (Rhygar and the Knights of the King) is one of many free indie brazilians games created using RPG Maker 2000 during the boom of the engine in Brazil during the 2000s. Like others of his kind, it's very unpretentious and full of typos and goofy jokes. It became somewhat of a cult classic among brazilian gamers of that era, and its relative success spum many others smaller RPG Maker 2000 brazilian games, and also two sequels.
